title: African states sign up to colossal trade bloc
text:
African states sign up to colossal trade bloc Wednesday, March 21, 2018 - 01:47 
Forty-four African nations have signed up to create a vast single market. But the two largest economies on the continent, Nigeria and South Africa, sat it out, potentially weakening the impact. Reuters' Duncan Miriri reports from Kigali. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Forty-four African nations have signed up to create a vast single market. But the two largest economies on the continent, Nigeria and South Africa, sat it out, potentially weakening the impact. Reuters' Duncan Miriri reports from Kigali. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pwKsGL
